title: Stable equilibrium - force vs radius graph

content.question: The net force on an object as a function of the position of the object along the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>-axis is shown. How many points of stable equilibrium exist for this object along the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>-axis?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
